overview: Janine Conder joined mpct Solutions (acquired by Aleri in January 2002) in 1985 and was promoted to Chief Financial Officer in 1988 when she assumed responsibility for all of mpct Solution’s (and now Aleri’s) financial, legal, tax, human resource, and administrative functions. Prior to that, Janine was a Manager with Price Waterhouse with responsibility for the audits of a broad range of clients from start-up organizations to large, publicly-held manufacturing companies. Janine also had extensive experience managing numerous SEC filings, including initial and secondary public stock offerings for a major computer software company, and was a founding member of Price Waterhouse’s National Computer Software Industry Specialist Group. Janine received a Masters in Business Administration from the University of Michigan and a Bachelor of Arts in Mathematics from Ball State University. She is a Certified Public Accountant and a recipient of the Illinois CPA Exam Silver Medal.
